title_job: Azure Storage Account with fortanixcustomer managed key Terraform Module Help
description:
I need assistance with my Terraform module for deploying an Azure storage account using a Fortanix customer managed key. The issue lies primarily with key management within the Fortanix integration. I am currently using the Fortanix SDK to manage the keys.

Ideal skills for this job include:
- Proficiency in Terraform
- Experience with Azure
- Knowledge of Fortanix key management
- Familiarity with SDKs and their integration in Terraform code
- Problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve key management issues.

Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Project will be done using screenshare as I can't share credentials.
